des: "And we thought blackberry jam was only for toast! Here it is stirred up with ketchup, brown sugar, mustard, cayenne, and red wine vinegar. The result is a sweet, pungent sauce that is great for pork, duck, or ribs. Use to baste while grilling."
ins: Stir ketchup, blackberry preserves, bourbon, green onions, red wine vinegar, garlic powder, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, and sea salt together in a bowl.
